column1: Table 36. Percent distribution of incidents, by type of crime and number of victims
data source: National Criminal Victimization Survey, 2005  NCJ 215244
authors:  Patsy Klaus and Cathy Maston
Table 36. Personal crimes of violence, 2005:  Percent distribution of incidents, by type of crime and number of victims
Note: Detail may not add to total shown because of rounding.
*Estimate is based on about 10 or fewer sample cases.
a/Excludes incidents for which the number of victims was not ascertained.
b/Includes verbal threats of rape and threats of sexual assault.
